text: Rajesh Gopinathan (born 1971) is the former CEO and Managing Director of Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), an Indian IT services and consulting organization and one of the country's largest employers. He was elevated to the role of Chief Executive in February 2017 after serving as the Chief Financial Officer since 2013. Rajesh is one of the youngest CEOs in the Tata Group. == References == Category:Living people Category:1971 births
title: Rajesh Gopinathan
